reviews.text: Ive always loved their banh mi so I had to try the grilled pork vermicelli with egg rolls this time. Although I would love a bit more vegs, which you can...
This place is great for people who enjoy pork. I was limited in my options as I don't eat pork. I got the shredded chicken banh mi and even that had a pork...
